body_html:
More correct, I think, would be to drop automatically attaching the handler, and instead just use the warnings library for deprecation warnings.

It's very odd to automatically opt-in on INFO-level logging. That should usually be a user-level concern.
body_text:
More correct, I think, would be to drop automatically attaching the handler, and instead just use the warnings library for deprecation warnings.
It's very odd to automatically opt-in on INFO-level logging. That should usually be a user-level concern.
body:
More correct, I think, would be to drop automatically attaching the handler, and instead just use the `warnings` library for deprecation warnings.

It's very odd to automatically opt-in on INFO-level logging. That should usually be a user-level concern.
